body.p:
June the the 18th 1862
To his Excellency Berriah Magoffin ofGovther of the Commonwealth Kentucky

Dear sir I want to inform you that Levi lions who escapt from Jerry South is in my neighborhood He has lay out in the woods untill He has taken cold and he has got the Dropsy and a nervous complainte he could be of no use eithe to South Or the State for he is a perfect Helpless Creature with a gang of little Naked Children

Now govner I was Takeing a few days ago with the man Man who Prossecuted levi lyons and has become convinced he was not guilty of what he was convicted for Therefore My Neighbor has called on me to write to uppon that Subject govenor I do hope you will pardon him For some boddy will run South to Expence for he can do her little good for him Self or any one else
Dear Sir I wish To giving best respects to your family And likewise Js South and his family
